name: MenuSubmenuTrigger
description:
A menu item that opens a submenu.
Renders a `<div>` element.

className.description: Class names applied to the element or a function that returns them based on the component's state.

disabled.description: If `true`, the menu item will be disabled.

label.description:
A text representation of the menu item's content.
Used for keyboard text navigation matching.

render.description: A function to customize rendering of the component.
